creator: Showdown Poker LLC
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Showdown Poker, the free to play poker game that remains competitive.

~~Game Modes~~

HEADS UP ONLINE - Match with players from around the world in 1 V 1 poker. Play for the top ranking and earn Tournament Chips along the way (by going on win-streaks)!

CASH GAMES (For S Coins) - Sit at the cash tables using S coins and create the biggest stack! Daily S coins leaders will be given special rewards announced daily on our Facebook Page.

PLAY WITH FRIENDS - Invite your friends to play some heads up poker and see who has the better bluffs!


DAILY TOURNAMENTS -
We host tournaments every day that can be entered using TC. Winners of these tournaments will be given special prizes announced on our Facebook page.

Follow us for our daily sweepstakes and all things poker!
https://www.facebook.com/ShowdownPokerOfficial/
https://www.instagram.com/showdownpokerofficial/?hl=en


You must be at least 18 years old to enter our Sweepstakes Tournaments. No purchase necessary. A purchase will not increase your chances of winning.
descriptionShort: Showdown Poker is the truly competitive free-to-play poker experience.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Introducing cash games! Earn S coins and climb the leaderboards for a chance to win special prizes.
- Heads up bug fixes.
- Replenish your chips up to 3 times daily by watching video ads.
- Earn S coins by winning heads up matches.

- Bug fixes

title: Showdown Poker - Online Competitive Hold'em

creator: Showdown Poker LLC
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Showdown Poker, the free to play poker game that remains competitive.

~~Game Modes~~

HEADS UP ONLINE - Match with players from around the world in 1 V 1 poker. Play for the top ranking and earn Tournament Chips along the way (by going on win-streaks)!

CASH GAMES (For S Coins) - Sit at the cash tables using S coins and create the biggest stack! Daily S coins leaders will be given special rewards announced daily on our Facebook Page.

PLAY WITH FRIENDS - Invite your friends to play some heads up poker and see who has the better bluffs!


DAILY TOURNAMENTS -
We host tournaments every day that can be entered using TC. Winners of these tournaments will be given special prizes announced on our Facebook page.

Follow us for our daily sweepstakes and all things poker!
https://www.facebook.com/ShowdownPokerOfficial/
https://www.instagram.com/showdownpokerofficial/?hl=en


You must be at least 18 years old to enter our Sweepstakes Tournaments. No purchase necessary. A purchase will not increase your chances of winning.
descriptionShort: Showdown Poker is the truly competitive free-to-play poker experience.

title: Showdown Poker - Online Competitive Hold'em

creator: Showdown Poker LLC
descriptionHtml:
Showdown Poker is the free-to-play poker game that remains competitive! S-Coins cannot be purchased, only won in-game or given as a daily bonus.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Compete across 3 game modes to win S-Coins which can be exchanged cool prizes and NFT's (coming soon).

HEADS UP MODE (1 v 1) - Match with players of similar ranking in a 1 on 1 game of Texas Hold'em. The winners will receive S-Coins, EXP, and a boost to their online ranking.

CASH GAME (Ring Game) - Using S-Coins, players can seat themselves at a 6-Max table and build their stack of S-Coins up!

TOURNAMENTS/SIT 'N GO- Register for daily MTT tournaments and Sit 'n Go tournaments to win S-Coins.

FRIEND MODE - Add and invite friends to private games of Heads Up poker. Keep track of who is in the lead and see who the better 1 v 1 poker player is!

CHALLENGES - Complete challenges and earn S-Coins and EXP. Trophies and NFT awards are coming soon!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

LANGUAGES - Currently we only offer the app in English. Other languages coming soon!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

SOCIAL MEDIA - Feel free to follow us on Instagram and Facebook for all things poker! We will announce giveaways, tournament dates, poker advice and more there! Don't be shy, send us a DM regarding anything as we always respond to our players promptly !

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/showdownpokerofficial/

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ShowdownPokerOfficial/

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

SUPPORT - For any questions or suggestions, DM us on social media or email us at beni@showdownpoker.io

We pride ourselves on responding to our players within 24 hours.
descriptionShort: Showdown Poker is the truly competitive free-to-play poker experience.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We are proud to announce our new UI has been released!
